unnormalised: Bore zannano, ami internetache vishayan uloiunk zai! Azkal ami kitlench tacher patyeun ravtanv tem kitench puro, khoreponn? Online chai order korcheaklean novea Bollywood filmam zhorouche poriant, internet aplia disachea jivitache fatrant puro zoddla. Punn ami kitlench favtt thambun ami vaprotat te nemanche vishayan chintun pollounk poddtam? Mhunnllear, tumkam khorench mahit asa "TCP/IP" kitem mhunn, vo tum bore mhunn dusreachea vangdda mandun ghetat?
normalised: Boream jannano, internetacher uloium! Aiz kal ami kitle tantun gunthlolim asa tem khuim khoreponnan vichitr asa, khorea? Online chai order korcheaklean him navim Bollywood chitrapatam poryant dakhounk, internet amchea disachem jivitachem ek bhag zalam. Pun ami kitle pavtim thambon vichar kortanv ami je utram vapurtanv? Mhaka dista, tumkam khoreaninch mahit asa “T-C-P slash I-P” mannkikit mhunn, vo tum fokot dusreachem sangata mandun ghetat?

unnormalised: Soro korunk adaran survat koruya. Konnem "the cloud" mhunnlem aikola asa? To khorench akashantlo lhan dhovo vostu nhoi, dukkhache gajali. To server-anchem zallem zaka data samballtat ani chalaunk ditat. Google Drive, Dropbox, vo tumchem email account-ache vishayan chint. Ti sogli mahiti tumchea phone-ancher thambun ravona; ti sogli "cloud-ant" asa. Bhov borem, nhoi? Ani BTW, tumi tumcho data sokallak backup kelo asa? Tem mahatvachem, visvas dovortat mhajeacher!
normalised: Chala, mul'tutvam pasun survat koruya. Tumkam konnen “the cloud” mhunn sanglolem aikunk asa? Tem soglem svorgar aslolem dhovem chiz nhoi, dukhanchem. Tem serversachem ek zall asa je datak sambhallta ani vyavasthaapank zata. Google Drive, Dropbox, vo tumchea email accountachem vichar korat. Hi soglem mahiti tumchea phonacher fokot thondd zata mhunn nhoi; tem "the cloud" uper asa. Khub bore, nhoi? Ani, mhaka dista, tumi tumchem data aatak pavtolim vachoilam asa? Tem khub mhotvachem, mhojem sangllem aikun gheiat!

unnormalised: Ani thodeachem "URLs" ani "IP addresses"achem sonsar asa. URL, zoxem www.google.com, tem ek website-achea sopeponnan vaprunk yeta tem gharcho nomunno. IP address, dusri koxen, ek website-achem *khoreponnachem* gharcho nomunno, ankddeanchem xrenni zoxem 192.168.1.1. Tumchea computer-an IP address vaprun website sodun kaddtta, punn URL tumkam mon'xam zaticheak yaad dovrunk sope. Tumchea auto driver-ak tum "12.34.56.78" vochun ditoloi, khoreponn? Tumi taka tumchea ghara lagichem chinn ditoloi, zoxem "MG Road-acher Big Bazaar lagim!"
normalised: Ani tedna “U-R-L’s” ani “I-P addresses” sanglele sansar asa. Ek U-R-L, www.google.com bhaxen, ek user-friendly address ek websiteache khatir asa. Ek I-P address, dusrere vatten, ek websiteachem *khoreponachem* ghorachem address bhaxen asa, ankdeanchem ek kramank ek shambh ani nove-e-torri dot ek shambh ani sxtti dot ek dot ek. Tumchem computer I-P addressak website sodunk vapurta, pun U-R-L’s amchea manvi lokank yaad dovrunk sope zata. Tumi tumchea auto driverak “bara dot chaallis dot ponnas ani so dot sat-e-torri” vochunk sangat vo? Tumi taka tumchea ghorache lagichem ek chin ditalem, jem mhunnge “M-G Roadacher aslolea Big Bazaarache lagin!”

unnormalised: "Bandwidth" mhunnllear kitem? Bandwidth mhunnllear ek pipe-acho rundai mhunn chint. Pipe jitlo rund, titlem chodd udok tachim vochum yeta. Toxench, tumchea lagim jitlo bandwidth asa, titlench tumchem internet connection vegaan cholta. Mhunnllear, tumi 4K film pollovnk sodtat ani tem addaun addaun cholta, tumkam chodd bandwidth zai poddtta. Tumchea pasorchea ISP (Internet Service Provider) zoxem Jio vo Airtel koddlean bore plans-anche vishayan vichar. Aamchea favt Rs. 499 plans khorench favo korina!
normalised: “Bandwidth” vishim kiteak? Bandwidthak ek pipeachem aakarachem vichar korat. Jem aakarachem pipe, tankachen zala to, zaito udak tantunlean vochpak sakta. Tech bhaxen, tumkam zaito bandwidth asa zalear, tumchem internet connection vegin cholta. Dekhik diunk, tumi char K chitrapat polleunk sodhtat zalear ani tem ek sarak thambta zalear, tumkam zaito bandwidth zai poddta. Tumchea lagichem I-S-P (Internet Service Provider) Jio vo Airtel bhaxen boreo yojnache khatir sodun gheiat. Zaito pavtim, tankanim rupya char shambh ani ekunnavo yojna khoreaninch ditalem nhui!

unnormalised: Ani amkam "Wi-Fi" visrunk favo na. Tem internet tumchea yantrank diunchem konnchench jaducho dhool nhoi. Wi-Fi ek wireless networking technology zaun asa zaka yantrank router-an internet-an joddpak ditat. Adaran, tem tumchea ghara bhitor internet signals pachurunchem ek lhan radio station-anchem vor-vor asa. Mhunnllear, dusrea vellar tumchem Wi-Fi khala poddta, tumi fakt universe-ak dos divonk nhoi, router-ak check kara! Ani kadachit, tumchea pasorcheachea password-ak. (Fakt gombhirponnan... chodd korun).
normalised: Ani ami “Wi-Fi” kadhun takunk zainam. Tem konnen internet tumchea devachenk haddta te jinachem dusth nhoi. Wi-Fi ek wireless networking technology jem deviceak routeraklean internetak zoddunk dita. Mul'tutvan, tem tumchea ghorant internet signals prasaran korchea khatir ek lhan radio station asat bhaxen asa. Tevorti, tumchem Wi-Fi poddonk zalear, fokot ek sansarak dosh divunk nhoi, routerak parkha! Ani kiteak nhoi, tumchea padrosachem password. (Fokot tumkam bholaunk… zaito soglem).

unnormalised: Mhunnllear, thoim tumkam asa: ek chitravachi ani lavachachi guide thoddea sadharan internet nemanche vishayan. He nem somzonk tumchea pasorcheachea chai-vele uloupachea vellar huskaar korunk tankam ditat punn tumkam problem sodounk ani tumchea internet-anche vapurnache vishayan chodd mahitiche nirnnoi gheunk favo kortat. Atam bhair voch ani bhitor voch ani visvasan internet vapur! Fakt online surakshit ravchea vishayan yaad dovra ani shanka-ichea links-ancher click korunk naka! Tumkam virus lagunk favo na. Ani tankeche passwords vaprat, borem? Kami zalear 12 characters lamb ani ankddeanchem ani chinanchem zoddni asa!
normalised: Tevorti, tumkam tem asa: internet utram kiteak mhunn eka vegen ani boreponachea dhartar ek margdarshak. Him utram samzonk tumkam tumchea chai-velachea ulounneancher zaito huxarkem aikunk dita pun tumkam problemam thonddavunk ani tumchea internet vaparache vishim zaito mahiti sodunk madat korta. Ata voch ani internetache pattanacher aslole vebsaiti vishvasan vapra! Fokot online surakshit asunk ani sandehkarak links cher click korunk nhoi yaad dovrat! Tumkam virus lagunk zaina. Ani sodeam zorpassam vaprat, borea? Bara aksharamchea podkeanim ani ankdeanche ani chinhanche misrun vaprat!
